short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Page Predefined Elements Auto-Deleter": Automatically removes unwanted elements from web pages based on your predefined settings.…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Page Predefined Elements Auto-Deleter": Automatically removes unwanted elements from web pages based on your predefined settings. Customize, save, and enjoy a cleaner browsing experience.

Key Features:

-Remove Content by CSS Selector:

-Flexible Targeting: Input a CSS selector to specify the exact element you want to hide. For example, you can use .product-reviews or #annoying-ad to target and remove sections like product reviews or intrusive ads.

-Save and Apply: Once you specify which elements to remove, "Custom Content Cleaner" saves your preferences. Every time you visit the site, the extension automatically applies these changes, ensuring a cleaner and more enjoyable browsing experience without having to re-enter your settings.
Persistent Across Sessions: Your settings are stored and applied each time you visit the configured sites, so you don't have to repeatedly set up the same customizations.

How It Works:

-Enter Your Preferences:

In the extension’s popup, enter the URL of the site where you want to apply changes.
Provide the CSS selector or HTML of the element you wish to remove.

-Automatic Cleanup:

"Custom Content Cleaner" will monitor the specified sites and automatically remove the elements that match your criteria whenever you visit them.

-Manage Your List:

Easily view and manage your list of saved elements and URLs within the extension. Delete or modify your preferences as needed to keep your browsing experience tailored to your liking.

!Why Use "Custom Content Cleaner"?!

Tailored Browsing: Eliminate distractions and focus on the content you care about.
Convenience: Once set up, the extension handles the cleanup automatically, saving you time and effort.
Flexibility: Choose between CSS selectors or HTML elements for precise control over what gets removed.
